content: **crocheted shawl in drops babymerino the piece is worked sideways with treble crochets ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-110 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down middle = approx 11 cm width measured along top from side to side = approx 73 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 17 beige **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
